alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Chase; Deuel; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 9:58PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds from showers will impact portions of southern Arthur, Perkins, Keith, northeastern Chase, southwestern Lincoln, southeastern Garden, southwestern McPherson, eastern Deuel and northwestern Hayes Counties through 1045 PM CDT/945 PM MDT/... At 957 PM CDT/857 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Lewellen to 13 miles south of Wallace. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Grant, Big Springs, Arthur, Sutherland, Hershey, Paxton, Wallace, Brule, Madrid, Elsie, Dickens, Keystone, Kingsley Dam, Sarben, Barton, Lemoyne, Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area, Roscoe and O`Fallons. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 48 and 126. Highway 92 between mile markers 118 and 165. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 98 and 166. Highway 83 between mile markers 62 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Chase; Deuel; Garden; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson; Perkins
